instanceVariables.name: MovementBehavior
instanceVariables.desc: Name of the movement behavior of the object implementing Controller.

instanceVariables.name: MoveDirection
instanceVariables.desc: Name of the current movement direction of the object implementing Controller. If the object stops moving, this should be "NULL".

instanceVariables.name: LastMovedDirection
instanceVariables.desc: Name of the last direction the object implementing Controller  moved towards.

instanceVariables.name: Occupied
instanceVariables.desc: True if the controller is occupied. Can prevent certain actions from occurring to prevent conflict.

instanceVariables.name: Action_NextToDrop
instanceVariables.desc: Number representing the action kind the object implementing Controller should perform when next to a drop.

instanceVariables.name: Action_NextToOtherEnemy
instanceVariables.desc: Number representing the action kind the object implementing Controller should perform when next to another enemy. (Not implemented yet.)

instanceVariables.name: Action_NextToWall
instanceVariables.desc: Number representing the action kind the object implementing Controller should perform when next to a wall.

instanceVariables.name: PhaseThrough
instanceVariables.desc: If true, the object implementing Controller will not trigger a bounce from the player when crushed.
